Name: Testery - Report Deployment
Description: Trigger a post-deployment test run in Testery. For more info, visit https://testery.io/.

Parameters.Name: TesteryGitReference
Parameters.Label: Testery Git Reference
Parameters.HelpText: The git hash of the commit for the version of the tests to be run.

Parameters.Name: TesteryToken
Parameters.Label: Testery Token
Parameters.HelpText: Your Testery API token (found in Testery -> Settings -> Integrations -> Show API Token)

Parameters.Name: TesteryProjectKey
Parameters.Label: Testery Project Key
Parameters.HelpText: The key of the test project in the Testery platform.

Parameters.Name: TesteryEnvironment
Parameters.Label: Testery Environment
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the environment defined in Testery where you want the tests to run. It may be useful to set this to Octopus.Deployment.Tenant.Name or Octopus.Environment.Name.

Parameters.Name: TesteryBuildId
Parameters.Label: Testery Build Id
Parameters.HelpText: The build ID from your CI/CD. If you have uploaded any test artifacts from your CI/CD, this build id should match the build id used when uploading artifacts.
